title: UPDATED KOREAN LUCIAN BUILD! | ULT ONE SHOTS - LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: this gameplay is just an update to make the original lucian build even better. just by adding in a death dance it simply makes your ult that much stronger i still recommend you rush yommus ghostblade and then black cleaver, but after that i feel is should go phantom dancer death dance and infinity edge.

body: subscribe to my channel for more
